ä½¿ç”¨å·¥å…·ï¼šKaptcha é“¾æ¥(éœ€ç§‘å­¦ä¸Šç½‘)

åœ°å€

<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.github.penggle/kaptcha -->
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.github.penggle</groupId>
    <artifactId>kaptcha</artifactId>
    <version>2.3.2</version>
</dependency>

ä½¿ç”¨Beanæ³¨å…¥è¿›è¡Œé…ç½®

@Configuration
public class KaptchaConfig {

    @Bean
    public Producer kaptchaProducer(){
        Properties properties = new Properties();
        properties.setProperty("kaptcha.image.width","100");
        properties.setProperty("kaptcha.image.height","40");
        properties.setProperty("kaptcha.textproducer.font.size","32");
        properties.setProperty("kaptcha.textproducer.font.color","0,0,0");
        properties.setProperty("kaptcha.textproducer.char.string","0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ");
        properties.setProperty("kaptcha.textproducer.char.length","4");
        properties.setProperty("kaptcha.noise.impl","com.google.code.kaptcha.impl.NoNoise");
        
        DefaultKaptcha kaptcha = new DefaultKaptcha();
        Config config = new Config(properties);
        kaptcha.setConfig(config);
        return kaptcha;
    }
}

public class SingleTon02 {

    private static SingleTon02 singleTon02;

    private SingleTon02(){
    }

    public static synchronized SingleTon02 getSingleTon02(){
        if(singleTon02==null){
            singleTon02 = new SingleTon02();
        }

    }
}

DCLåŒé‡æ£€æµ‹é”

public class SingleTon03 {
    private static SingleTon03 singleTon03;
    private SingleTon03(){
        //æ·»åŠ åå°„åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢å•ä¾‹è¢«åå°„é€šè¿‡æ„é€ å™¨ç ´å
        if(singleTon03!=null){
           	throw new RunTimeException("å•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼ä¸‹ç¦æ­¢é€šè¿‡åå°„åˆ›å»ºå®ä¾‹ï¼");
        }
    }
    public static SingleTon03 getInstance(){
        //ä¸ºäº†é˜²æ­¢æ¯æ¬¡éƒ½è¿›è¡ŒåŠ é”åŒæ­¥ é¦–å…ˆåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦åˆå§‹åŒ–å•ä¾‹
        if(singleTon03==null){
            synchronized (SingleTon03.class){
                //åŒé‡æ£€æµ‹é”æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢å…¶ä»–çº¿ç¨‹é˜»å¡åœ¨è·å–é”å¤„ï¼Œé”é‡Šæ”¾åé€ æˆé‡å¤åˆ›å»º
                if(singleTon03==null){
                    singleTon03 = new SingleTon03();
                }
            }
        }
        return singleTon03;
    }
}

å¯¼å…¥Spring Email JaråŒ… é“¾æ¥:Spring Boot Starter Mail

<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework.boot/spring-boot-starter-mail -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-mail</artifactId>
            <version>3.0.2</version>
        </dependency>

åœ¨é¡¹ç›®ä¸­å®Œæˆé‚®ç®±é…ç½®

# MailProperties
spring.mail.host=smtp.163.com
spring.mail.port=465
spring.mail.username=xxxxxxxx@163.com
spring.mail.password=xxxxxxxxx
spring.mail.protocol=smtps
spring.mail.properties.mail.smtp.ssl.enable=true

Mailå·¥å…·ç±»

package com.community.community.util;

import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
import org.springframework.mail.javamail.JavaMailSender;
import org.springframework.mail.javamail.MimeMessageHelper;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

import javax.mail.MessagingException;
import javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage;

//é‚®ç®±å·¥å…·ç±»
@Component
public class MailClient {

    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(MailClient.class);

    @Autowired
    private JavaMailSender mailSender;

    @Value("${spring.mail.username}")
    private String from;

    public void sendMail (String to,String subject, String content){
        try {
            MimeMessage message = mailSender.createMimeMessage();
            MimeMessageHelper helper = new MimeMessageHelper(message);
            //å‘ä»¶äºº
            helper.setFrom(from);
            //æ”¶ä»¶äºº
            helper.setTo(to);
            //ä¸»é¢˜
            helper.setSubject(subject);
            //å†…å®¹ trueè¡¨ç¤ºå¯è¯†åˆ«htmlæ ¼å¼
            helper.setText(content,true);
            mailSender.send(helper.getMimeMessage());
        } catch (MessagingException e) {
            logger.error("é‚®ä»¶å‘é€å¤±è´¥ï¼š"+e.getMessage());
        }
    }
}

ä½¿ç”¨æµ‹è¯•

@SpringBootTest
public class MailTests {

    @Autowired
    private MailClient mailClient;

    @Autowired
    private TemplateEngine templateEngine;

    //æ™®é€šæ–‡æœ¬
    @Test
    public void MailSendTest(){
        //å‘é€é‚®ç®± æ ‡é¢˜ å†…å®¹
        mailClient.sendMail("1937026980@qq.com","test","hello success!");
    }

    //htmlæ–‡æœ¬
    @Test
    public void HtmlMailTest(){
        Context context = new Context();
        context.setVariable("username","sunday");
        String content = templateEngine.process("/mail/activation", context);
        mailClient.sendMail("1937026980@qq.com","Test",content);
    }
}

entry.title: my test
entry.content:
import java.util.*;

/*
* public class ListNode {
*   int val;
*   ListNode next = null;
* }
*/

public class Solution {
    /**
    * 
    * @param head ListNodeç±» 
    * @param m intæ•´å‹ 
    * @param n intæ•´å‹ 
    * @return ListNodeç±»
    */
    public ListNode reverseBetween (ListNode head, int m, int n) {
        // write code here
        ListNode res = new ListNode(-1);
        res.next = head;

        ListNode pre = res,cur = head;

        for(int i = 1;i<m;i++){
            pre = cur;
            cur = cur.next;
        }

        for(int i = m;i < n;i++){
            ListNode temp = cur.next;
            cur.next = temp.next;
            temp.next = pre.next;
            pre.next = temp;
        }

        return res.next;
    }
}

public static void main(){
    System.out.println("Test!");
}

IYUIYUG
